summary: Completed e2e testing for Admin Destinations, Admin Promotions, and Provider Subscription features. All 30 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified - admin login, dashboard navigation buttons, destinations management, promotions management, and provider portal all working.

ui_bugs.issue: Subscription status card may not render correctly when subscription_plan is empty string

issues: 'shadow*' style props are deprecated warnings - should migrate to boxShadow
Unexpected text node warnings in View components

action_items: Consider fixing subscription status card rendering when provider has empty subscription_plan
Migrate shadow* style props to boxShadow to remove deprecation warnings
Fix 'Unexpected text node' warnings in View components
critical_code_review_comments: Provider dashboard shows offers correctly but subscription status card may have conditional rendering issue when subscription_plan is empty
Console warnings about deprecated props should be addressed for cleaner logs
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_ prefixed destinations and promotions during testing - cleaned up after tests
